meanings.definition: A card game similar to gin rummy.
meanings.sent1: During the family gathering, we played a fun game of rummy.
meanings.sent2: She always wins at rummy because she knows all the rules.
meanings.sent3: The rummy game got so intense that we lost track of time.
meanings.sent4: His strategy in rummy was like a well-thought-out plan in a battle.
meanings.sent5: The sound of cards shuffling filled the room as we prepared for rummy.

meanings.sent1: My aunt is a skilled rummy who never loses a game.
meanings.sent2: The rummy at the club taught us some new tricks for the game.
meanings.sent3: The rummy chuckled as he won yet another round effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: She was a rummy with a poker face, never revealing her hand.
meanings.sent5: The group of friends included a rummy who always brought excitement to the game night.

meanings.sent1: The rummy old man lived in a house filled with peculiar artifacts.
meanings.sent2: She had a rummy habit of collecting mismatched socks.
meanings.sent3: The cat's rummy behavior of chasing its tail amused everyone.
meanings.sent4: The rummy clouds in the sky looked like giant cotton candies.
meanings.sent5: His rummy choice of toppings on the pizza surprised everyone at the party.
